entities.name: albus
entities.description: Albus is described as Albus's brother, indicating a familial relationship. He is also mentioned as being bookish and preferring reasoned discussion over dueling.

entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is described as Albus's brother, indicating a familial relationship. He is also mentioned as not being bookish and preferring to settle arguments by dueling rather than through reasoned discussion.

entities.name: kendra
entities.description: Kendra is described as Albus's mother, indicating a familial relationship.

relationships.description: The text describes Aberforth and Albus as brothers.
The text describes Kendra as Albus's mother.
